title: # 460 - Jamie Kennedy & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Actor/Comedian Jamie Kennedy. We talk about the movie business, how Malibu’s most wanted was created, stand up vs film, Paris Hilton, NFT’s, and much more!

 

Jamie's film "LAST CALL" is available in select theaters, on digital and on demand today!

 

This episode is brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Noom. Sign up for your trial today at http://www.noom.com/bertcast   

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Chew. Try Blue Chew free when you use the code “BERT” at checkout at http://www.bluechew.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Upstart. Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to http://www.upstart.com/bert

 

This episode is also brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Sunday. Go to http://www.getsunday.com/bertcast to get $20 off your custom lawn plan at checkout!

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
